Lady Trojan Softball Thursday!

The CHS Lady Trojans will be in action Thursday morning at Faircloth Field in a preseason scrimmage against the TCC Yellow Jackets.  The gates will open at 9:00 AM, with the first pitch at 10:00.  Admission is $5.00.
